title: Savannah Guthrie pleas for mother's return and tells possible kidnappers 'we will pay'
summary_full: "We received your message," the US news anchor says in the latest video plea for the return of her mother Nancy Guthrie, 84, who is believed to be abducted.
summary_public: "We received your message," the US news anchor says in the latest video plea for the return of her mother Nancy Guthrie, 84, who is believed to be abducted.
